root: ^The Prof.: “It must be done. For the sake of everyone…”
^The Prof.: “It sings like a discordant howl.”
^The Prof.: “Why do ‘you’ only speak to me?”
^The Prof.:  “I will not let ‘you’ win. No matter what. No matter how similar we may be.”

^The screen changes to where the first landmass is and the professor is on screen (This should be as simple as changing the background with the sprite already there) 7A should also be visible The professor should be on the left of the screen, 7A should be on the right side Text Box in the middle
^7A: “What are you muttering to yourself!? Are you keeping something from me!?”
^The Prof.: “I hold no secrets. I hold no lies.”
^7A: “Uh huh! I am fucking sure! You’re a liar just like everyone else!”
^7A: “Jesus! How much did that SOLDIER tell you!? I know that ‘knight in shining boot licking’ ain’t gonna tell me jack!”
^The Prof.: “Words are not needed in pain. It paints a heavy coat of black on the canvas of your soul.”
^7A: “This conversation is a waste of my damn time…”
^7A leaves from the right side of the screen via model being dragged off/disappearing
^Dolph enters from the right side being dragged in/appearing
^The Prof.: “It is her who is troubled. I have repaired what needs to be mended.”
^Dolph: “So you’re going to be able to fix the damage caused by ‘him’, right?”

^The Prof.: “It is an idea that grows like a perpetual  disease. An idea that is an answer. An idea that is everywhere. An idea that is nowhere. An idea that shouldn’t exist. Perhaps I can fix it. But I can’t guarantee it.”
^The Prof.: “He draws deeper inside. Watch yourself.”
^Dolph: “You can call him ‘The One’. I read the files. I know you know.”
^The Prof.: “Do you pray for death? Do you wish for your land to fall? Don’t speak ‘his’ name. Don’t think about ‘him’. Even this conversation is dangerous.”
^The Prof leaves from the left of the screen dragged off/disappearing
^Command(via unknown means, they are not physically in the scene): “You’re heading to the next landmass, right?”
^Dolph: “Mission is seeming to be on task. We’re still deciding where exactly we will go.”
^Command: “Keep an eye on signs of ‘him’. Report back to us about it.”
^Dolph: “I think it is best we don’t talk about ‘him’ over communications.”
^Command: *hangs up* (Perhaps the textbox shakes or something to indicate that they have left the scene since there’s no sprite for command)
^Dolph: “I’ve heard you use percussion instruments. Think you will be able to cover me when we fight?”

^Grugg: *Shakes in agreement with the statement* (Note any line that uses  * means the character would be doing it you can either move the character physically or the textbox whichever is more natural)
^Dolph: “Good to know you have my back.”
^Dolph: “No matter what, protect the professor at all costs. Even if it costs my life. The professor must survive.”
^Dolph: “Good. Now one last thing, watch out for 7A she was…unstable when C.H.O.R.D. found her.”
